wikipedia_page.main: Lucy Hatton (born 8 November 1994) is a British track and field athlete competing in the hurdles. She was the silver medallist in the 60 metres hurdles at the European Athletics Indoor Championships in 2015. Her personal best of 7.90 seconds in that event ranks her third on the British all-time lists.

link_mentions.page: 2015 European Athletics Indoor Championships – Women's 60 metres hurdles

response: She had strong indoor form at the start of 2015, bringing her 60 m hurdles best down to 8.13 seconds, then 8.11 seconds. In the absence of Tiffany Porter, she was the winner of the British indoor title with a time of 8.04 seconds.2015 British Indoor Championships Women's 60 hurdles. Power of 10. Retrieved on 2015-03-07. This brought her a place on the team for the 2015 European Athletics Indoor Championships and she excelled, improving her personal best in the heat (8.03), semi-final (7.95), and then the final (7.93) – as a result, she took the bronze medal behind Alina Talay and fellow British athlete Lucy Hatton.Rowbottom, Mike (2015-03-06). Torneus earns European Indoor long jump title in Prague after 2013 torments in Gothenburg. Inside the Games. Retrieved on 2015-03-07. This time raised her to fourth on the British all-time lists for the event, behind Porter, Jessica Ennis and Hatton.60HW Women Overall All Time. Power of 10. Retrieved on 2015-03-07.
